name: Book Compact
author: asterixcool
description:
Purpose: "binarization" for scanned books. A compact, lightweight version trained for general-purpose cleanup. While it performs well, RealPLSKR delivers superior results for more complex cases.

- Strengths (Handles Well):

✔ Color bleed
✔ Spots & small speckles
✔ Mould stains
✔ Fine hair & scratches – Good at thin, faint lines.
✔ Light pencil marks
✔ Dividers & text preservation
- Weaknesses (Struggles With):

✖ Large speckles
✖ Thick hair/clumps – May leave remnants or blurring.
✖ Photographs – Bad lighting; noisy/dark images degrade quality.
